attributes.action: Stop tax payer's money being used to support migration.
attributes.additional_details: Use the money to prevent migration and secure boarders.
attributes.background: Stop using British tax payer's money to support migration.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about the use of taxpayers' money to 'support' migration, however it's not clear which specific forms of support for migration you want to no longer be funded through taxation.

You might like to sign these petitions, which call for related actions:

'Referendum on reducing net migration and refugee numbers': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596627

'Withdraw from the UN Global compact for migration': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595284

'Take action to make entering the UK illegally extremely unattractive for adults': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600378

Please note that, if you choose to start another petition in future, you must include your full name as we can't accept petitions started only using a first name.
